userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The materials from Washington and Lee University Special Collections are made available for use in research, teaching, and private study, pursuant to U.S. Copyright law. The user assumes full responsibility for any use of the materials, including but not limited to, infringement of copyright and publication rights of reproduced materials. Any materials used should be fully credited with the source. Permission for publication of this material, in part or in full, must be secured with the Head of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation: [Identification of item], Rockbridge County Bible Society Account Book, WLU Coll. 0165, Special Collections and Archives, James G. Leyburn Library, Washington and Lee University, Lexington, VA. In some cases the citation format may vary. Please contact Special Collections staff to verify the appropriate format.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Rockbridge County Bible Society distributed bibles in Rockbridge Co., Va. Also known as Lexington Bible Society (before 1846?).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains accounts of expenditures, membership list (1846), and records of Bibles distributed.
